Lunatone (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0336: Seviper
Pokémon
#0338: Solrock →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Lunatone (TCG Pocket).

Lunatone has been featured on 14 different cards since it debuted in the EX Sandstorm expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Lunatone cards are normally Fighting-type or Psychic-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Lunatone

Lunatone
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Lunatone EX Sandstorm 8/100 Miracle of the Desert 029/053
Lunatone EX Deoxys 36/107 Clash of the Blue Sky 051/082
Lunatone EX Legend Maker 20/92 Mirage Forest 045/086
Lunatone Great Encounters 76/106 Moonlit Pursuit  
Lunatone Supreme Victors 32/147 Beat of the Frontier 044/100
Lunatone Triumphant 25/102 Clash at the Summit 048/080
Lunatone Plasma Storm 73/135 Freeze Bolt 037/059
Lunatone XY 63/146 Collection X 030/060
Lunatone Burning Shadows 68/147 Facing a New Trial   030/049
        GX Battle Boost   052/114
Lunatone Celestial Storm 61/168 Champion Road 028/066
Lunatone Darkness Ablaze 072/189 Explosive Walker 032/070
Lunatone Pokémon GO 034/078 Pokémon GO 034/071
Crown Zenith 062/159 VSTAR Universe   056/172
Crown Zenith GG11/GG70 VSTAR Universe 184/172
Lunatone Obsidian Flames 092/197 Ruler of the Black Flame 047/108
Lunatone Mega Evolution     Mega Brave 026/063
MEP Black Star Promos
